description: Evil is slowly covering the world. Forces of darkness are pursuing the lost art of Alchemy, and as they draw ever closer to their foul purpose, mankind hangs in the balance.
Uncover a map filled with unique biomes, djinn, characters, and enemies.
Carefully plan your moves to fight off deadly opponents.
Gather the four types of elemental creatures - fire, water, wind, and earth - and combine them in different ways for some of the most awe-inspiring magical spells ever seen.
